message:
“Nearly 160 children recovered during sex trafficking sting in the Atlanta Metro area.” 
Great job by the many agencies involved!
This type of operation demonstrates the importance of law enforcement officers being trained in HT investigations and the need for collaboration among all agencies.

data.description: Operation Safe Summer was a collaborative effort between the FBI’s Atlanta field office and 38 law enforcement agencies in six metro counties.
data.title: Metro sex-trafficking sting rescues nearly 160 children, authorities say
